attributes.review: Once I download this app it started screeching and my dog started going crazy and singing the NATIONAL ANTHEM! He was singing so loud we sadly had to put him down. I had the app for about 12 days and it had not stoped screeching the next day my phone lit on fire and random birds stormed into our house and ate our bunny. When we trued to stop them they lit our kitchen on fire. So now I’m stuck with about 65 birds and occasionally start singing the National anthem. So I don’t recommend this app at all.
attributes.title: Do not download!!!!

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded!!! The design is terrible, the app took 2 months to download, the app is filled with bots that keep trying to hack into your phone with pop up ads, and it takes up way too much space in my phone!! Whoever is responsible for this app is an idiot who isn’t qualified for his job!! Definitely won’t miss this piece of junk taking up space on my phone😤if you know what’s good for you, you won’t download this app!
attributes.title: AWFUL🤢🤮

attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting. My child opened this app up and saw PORN. This is a Christian household and we do not condone to this type of behavior. I myself am a trump supporter and I FORCED my kids to watch Fox News but now I’m sick of it. We do not want pornography it is disgusting and if I hear one more thing about this COVID-19 I’m gonna SCREAM. Donald J Trump you should ashamed for talking about these topics I though we were gonna atleast teach us about our lives that are affecting us today. I can’t believe this PORNOGRAPHY IN MY CHILDS FACE. MY PROUDLY UNVACCINATED CHILD THIS IS DISGUSTING.
attributes.title: P*RNOGRAPHY

attributes.review: It literally took me almost 7 hours to download the app and after it finally did it took up more than half of my storage. attributes.title: 0 stars if I could

attributes.review:

Rate 1/5!! If I could I’d give it a 0!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see news as it’s rated #1 in news. Now I saw some other reviews of this app stealing people’s fridges, thankfully mine is still here but my baby monkeys were stolen. Shortly after downloading this app, one of my baby money’s peed on my marble countertop so I threw it in the washing machine like I normally do. Well as I went to take it out, a small orange man who heinously reeked of spray tan popped out and snatched all my baby monkeys AND MY WEAVE. Now I have no baby monkeys, no weave, and my laundry room smells of ugly orange man😔
attributes.title: STOLE MY BABY MONKEYS 😤😤
